title: NFT's as Proof of Donations (PoD)
description: NGO's are held back from investing in technology, marketing, and talent that could transform the scale of how they raise funds.
solution: We help NGO's to raise funds using NFT's as Proof of Donation to build trust, while giving the chance to live unique experiences as rewards.
experience: We did an MVP in Argentina with +3k organic users, 8 celebrities and a partnership with the Red Cross to help them fight Covid 19.
